    • Method Detail

      • getPiece

        java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getPiece(BoardPiece.PieceType type,
                                         BoardPiece.PieceColor color,
                                         char x,
                                         int y)
        Search for pieces by name, color and either (or both) of coordinates.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of the piece.
        color - The color of the piece.
        x - The abscissa of the piece.
        y - The ordinate of the piece.
        Returns:
        An array of matches - corresponding indexes of pieces array.

      • switchMove

        void switchMove()
        Switches the current move

      • makeMove

        void makeMove(char fromX,
            int fromY,
            char toX,
            int toY,
            boolean capture)
        Simple move function with from & to variables. Make a move on the board.
        Parameters:
        fromX - The origin abscissa.
        fromY - The origin ordinate.
        toX - The destination abscissa.
        toY - The destination ordinate.
        capture - True if there is a capture.

      • currentFEN

        java.lang.String currentFEN(boolean reduced)
        Build the FEN from the board.
        Parameters:
        reduced - True if the FEN need to be reduced.
        Returns:
        The current FEN.

      • loadFEN

       throws IncorrectFENException
        Load the FEN into board.
        Parameters:
        fen - The FEN.
        Throws:
        IncorrectFENException - If the FEN is incorrect.
